name: nanobanana-mcp
description: AI image generation and editing for Claude Code via Gemini. Generate, edit, and iteratively refine images using text prompts without leaving your terminal.

plugins.name: nanobanana-mcp
plugins.description: MCP server providing generate_image, edit_image, and continue_editing tools powered by Google Gemini. Supports model selection (Flash, Pro, 3.1 Flash), security-hardened file handling, and iterative editing sessions. Images saved to ~/nanobanana-images/.
